眝字的基本解释

眝
zhù
远视：“眝美目其何望！”
睁大眼睛：“眝目观之，器皿皆是玻璃、水晶、琥珀、玛瑙为之，曲尽巧妙，非人间所有。”

眝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》直吕切，上語，澄。］
张目远视。

眝字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　眝； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页804第15
【唐韻】陟呂切【集韻】展呂切，?音貯。【說文】長眙也。一曰張目也。【陸機·弔魏武帝文】貯美目其何望。　又【廣韻】【正韻】直呂切【集韻】【韻會】丈呂切，?音佇。義同。　【字彙補】亦作?。

眝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
眝字的起名意思

暂无。

Squint
Basic explanation of words
Squint
zhù
Farsightedness: "What's the hope for beautiful eyes!"
Open your eyes: "Looking at it, the utensils are made of glass, crystal, amber, and agate. The song is ingenious and not owned by the world."

[①]［zhù］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Lu Qi, on the language, Cheng. ]
Zhang eyes farsighted.

[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　眝; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 804 No. 15
[Tang Yun] Zhi Lv Che [Ji Yun] Zhan Lv Che, sound storage. 【Said the text】Changyi also. One said Zhang Mu. [Lu Ji·Diao Weiwu Emperor Wen] What is the hope of storing beauty.　[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Zhi Lu Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Zhang Lu Qi,? The same meaning.　【Word Supplement】also made?.
